name: v1.6.2
body:
simmer update to ignore I/O errors when searching log file for pass/fail

```

        name = "rules_verilog",
        urls = ["https://github.com/Lightelligence/rules_verilog/archive/v1.6.2.tar.gz"],

verilog_dependencies()
```

name: v1.6.0
body:
- new dv_tb elab args to increase sim performance (-newperf, -plusperf)
- simmer cmd line arg to enable Cadence simulation performance profiling (--profile)
- new pre_run flow  for simmer/rules-verilog to run bazel targets prior to dv_tb simulation 

```
load("@bazel_tools//tools/build_defs/repo:http.bzl", "http_archive")
    http_archive(
        name = "rules_verilog",
        urls = ["https://github.com/Lightelligence/rules_verilog/archive/v1.6.0.tar.gz"],
        sha256 = "cd32e6629bf6e7f670ed38e8a2c4c3a57df07284b3a6609d074bede63b1774fe",
        strip_prefix = "rules_verilog-1.6.0",
    )
load("@rules_verilog//:deps.bzl", "verilog_dependencies")
verilog_dependencies()
```

name: v1.5.0
body:

* simmer support for delta cycle SHM capture
* simmer adding coverage options to rerun scripts

name: v1.1.0
body:
* breaking simmer script into an executable (still called simmer) and several library modules
* bug fix to simmer cov_opts
* BENCHES_REL_DIR now comes from env var instead  of hard-coded (now defaults to "benches")

```

```

name: v1.0.0
body:
- added simmer Python script for simulator compile and simulation
- added support Python libraries required by simmer
- simmer usage and command-line examples to be added in a future release
- removed duplicate flist generation for XRUN and VCS platforms

```

        strip_prefix = "rules_verilog-1.0.0",

```

name: Release v0.0.11
body:
Fixed outstanding issues with verilog_rtl_lint_test from v0.0.10.
- The '-design_info' no longer appears twice in the HAL command line arguments
- Removed the 'set -e' command in the HAL shell script to allow the parsing script to always be called
- Changed the lint parsing script to be executable

load("@bazel_tools//tools/build_defs/repo:http.bzl", "http_archive")
http_archive(
    name = "rules_verilog",
    urls = ["https://github.com/Lightelligence/rules_verilog/archive/v0.0.11.tar.gz"],
    sha256 = "4c35ddbdd182943d39dd9000ce14a1ad803eed66481c179bad1bf68429d45ebe",
    strip_prefix = "rules_verilog-0.0.11",
)
load("@rules_verilog//:deps.bzl", "verilog_dependencies")
verilog_dependencies()

name: Release v0.0.10
body:
There are several issues in verilog_rtl_lint_test in this release. Please use v0.0.11.



Significant refactors and improvements for RTL lint test, CDC test, and unit tests.
- Converted all three tests to use template files instead of building the file contents directly in the rules.
- Added options in the verilog_rtl_unit_test and verilog_rtl_unit_test_svunit templates to either launch a waveform viewer directly from the bazel test, or render a waveform database that can be loaded separately.
- Added flag to CDC test to prevent licenses from being revoked mid-test.

```
load("@bazel_tools//tools/build_defs/repo:http.bzl", "http_archive")
http_archive(
    name = "rules_verilog",
    urls = ["https://github.com/Lightelligence/rules_verilog/archive/v0.0.10.tar.gz"],
    sha256 = "d7bdf3bc882d03918c2871990d2e62d13f82b370a8ca072ce2fba4ff87dca4b6",
    strip_prefix = "rules_verilog-0.0.10",
)
load("@rules_verilog//:deps.bzl", "verilog_dependencies")
verilog_dependencies()
```

name: Release v0.0.6
body:
Minor fixes and refactors related to verilog_rtl_cdc_test:
- Renamed `bbox` argument to `bbox_modules`
- Added `bbox_array_size` argument
- Added support for multiple tcl command files by changing `cmd_file` argument to `cmd_files`
- Fixed bug where template was using a hard-coded bash command instead of the `CDC_COMMAND` template argument

```
load("@bazel_tools//tools/build_defs/repo:http.bzl", "http_archive")
http_archive(
    name = "rules_verilog",
    urls = ["https://github.com/Lightelligence/rules_verilog/archive/v0.0.6.tar.gz"],
    sha256 = "6110e46425f567321af5a5c88d22715fe489edadc517a74fbcc359ca86063415",
    strip_prefix = "rules_verilog-0.0.6",
)
load("@rules_verilog//:deps.bzl", "verilog_dependencies")
verilog_dependencies()
```
